name: Circle Throw
description:
Circle Throw is an one touch game. Throw the ball in the direction of the arrow from gaps on the circle. Be careful and don't touch the circle. At first everything is easy but the circle will accelerate gradually. Colors will change and playability will get harder. Try to make the highest score. Share score with your friends.

Totally free. Are you ready to participate in addictive fun?
Have fun!
